text: Søren Østergaard (born 11 May 1957, in Esbjerg) is a Danish film, television and stage actor. ==Selected filmography== * Facing the Truth (2002) * Pain of Love (1992) ==Awards== * Bodil Award for Best Actor for Pain of Love (1993) == External links == * * Søren Østergaard at the Danish Film Institute * Biography at Agenzy A/S Category:1957 births Category:Danish male actors Category:Bodil Award winners Category:People from Esbjerg Category:Living people
title: Søren Østergaard
